item.title: music
item.description: among the flowers, beneath the moons an esela playlist. navidrome.lunarconstruct.net/share/eULwOZzuO0 .

item.title: Construction
item.description: The act of creating a living being, by imbuing an inanimate object (Essence) with a soulpiece from the creator’s Soul.

item.title: Domains
item.description: all domains are defined as kingdoms or independent settlements. kingdoms are domains comprised of multiple villages, towns, or cities.

item.title: Education across Domains
item.description: settlements will often have small schoolhouses for children, but more likely than not will not have any kind of upper/continued education for adults.

item.title: Dust
item.description: Dust tags: magic At the beginning of the universe, The Expanse was empty. Dust came to be, alongside the first Inna, Hafei, to fill the void.

item.title: Dust within Beings
item.description: To be considered “alive”, a being must possess enough Soul to hold themselves together, and support their life.

item.title: Core Archetypes
item.description: The deepest, most essential layer of the soul, representing intrinsic truth, insight, and power.

item.title: Veil Archetypes
item.description: The middle layer acts as a veil or bridge between the surface and the core, with abilities focused on connection, discovery, and interaction.
